title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 700.8 - Location and hours for public inspections and public notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 700.8 - Location and hours for public inspections and public notice

State Regulations
(a) Requests for public access to records
will be accepted, information provided and records may be viewed (by prior
arrangement) from Monday through Friday, except legal holidays, between 9 a.m. and 5 p.m. in the offices of the commission at 270 Broadway, 26th Floor, New

York, NY 10007, (212) 577-0700. (b) The name, title and business address of the records access officer and the
records access appeals officer and information concerning the location where
records may be viewed is available at the commission's offices at 270 Broadway, 26th Floor, New York, NY 10007, or by calling (212) 577-0700 and requesting
information on Freedom of Information Law requests. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
700.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
